Review

Review from Week 2 : Lesson 3 : Hashes. One (or more) pair will rehash the previous session's lesson by teaching the basic learnings to the group. They will explain it to the others by drawing a diagram, using an analogy, telling a story or in some other way creatively communicating the idea without using code.

Classes and inheritance

What Is It?

Everything in Ruby is an object, right? Well some objects are different than other objects in that they belong to a class.
